note.p: Death: His house in Gower Street, London (01 January 1838)

Freemason, joined three London Lodges; 1802, unnamed Lodge No 3, then meeting at the George and Vulture, Lower Shadwell, london, subsequently St George's Lodge No 5, now St George's and Cornerstone Lodge No 5
References: Library and Museum of Freemasonry, 'Freemasons and the Royal Society; Alphabetical List of Fellows of the Royal Society who were Freemasons' London, 2010, page 23-24
